CustomField.formula: ROUND(9 * ( (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Recent_Response_Time__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(Recent_Response_Time__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 9 * (MOD(Recent_Response_Time__c - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 14:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 9 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c)) >= 14 && HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c)) <= 23, Recent_Inbound_Message__c, IF( HOUR(TIMEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c)) < 14, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c)) + " " + '14:00:00' ), DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(Recent_Inbound_Message__c)) + " " + '23:00:00' ) ) ) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 14:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ), 2)
CustomField.label: Bus Hrs Between Emails
